subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Ron Lewis hit a key driving layup and No. 3 Ohio State overcame Greg Oden’s foul trouble Saturday, closing on an 11-4 run to hold off visiting Purdue, 63-56.
snippet: Ron Lewis hit a key driving layup and No. 3 Ohio State overcame Greg Oden’s foul trouble Saturday, closing on an 11-4 run to hold off visiting Purdue, 63-56.
